description: This lively and very busy trattoria run by the energetic Elisa owes its success to a winning combination of traditional dishes (the fresh hand-made pasta, also sold in the shop next door, is a particular highlight) and specialities reinterpreted with a touch of imagination by the female chef, such as the ossobuco cut lengthways. You may like to try both by choosing a typical Bolognese dish as a starter followed by one of the chef’s more original options for your main course.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Visa credit card']
